definition: religious belief/to practice a faith/to be religious
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: I really wonder whether there're many people of the irreligion.
sentences.chinese: 我真怀疑不信教的人究竟能有多少。

sentences.english: The believers and the non-believers are politically equal.
sentences.chinese: 信教的和不信教的，在政治上一律平等。

sentences.english: The believers and the non-believers are politically equal.
sentences.chinese: 信教的和不信教的，在政治上一律平等。

sentences.english: Why is it so many good, kind religious people suffer the tortures of the damned in their mind and body?
sentences.chinese: 为什么这么多良善信教的人们身心都受到邪祟的折磨？

sentences.english: It is a complicated systematic engineering to the honesty education for college students.
sentences.chinese: 对大学生的诚信教育是一项复杂的系统工程。

sentences.english: Finally, courses in the education of accounting integrity should be offered.
sentences.chinese: 最后，开设会计诚信教育的相关课程。

sentences.english: Deeply religious, she was also offended by his apparent atheism.
sentences.chinese: 另外，她是个虔诚的教徒，对丈夫不信教也深为不满。

sentences.english: Finally, offer courses in the education of accounting integrity concerned.
sentences.chinese: 最后，开设会计诚信教育的相关课程。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the meaning and measure of honesty education of nursing students.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨对护生进行诚信教育的意义和举措。

sentences.english: He was an honest man, oppressed by the inroads of dissent .
sentences.chinese: 他是个诚实的人，为不信教者的侵蚀所苦恼。

sentences.english: So, the appropriate countermeasure should be taken to strengthen the honesty education for university student.
sentences.chinese: 应采取相应的对策，加强对大学生的诚信教育。

sentences.english: The Constitution does not allow the state to force religion upon non-believers.
sentences.chinese: 宪法不允许国家将宗教强加于不信教者。

sentences.english: Oftentimes people become more religious in times of sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 通常人们在悲伤的时候更容易信教。

sentences.english: Both religious and non-religious blacks depended on the church.
sentences.chinese: 无论信教还是不信教的黑人，都把教堂当作靠山。

sentences.english: Both religious and non-religious blacks depended on the church.
sentences.chinese: 无论信教还是不信教的黑人，都把教堂当作靠山。

sentences.english: Fifthly, the counter measure of good faith education.
sentences.chinese: 大学生诚信教育体系的构建。
